post.author: Admin
post.title: Fruit Sale, Chaperones, and more
post.description: We had a great start to the Fruit Sale with our BLITZ this weekend… the weather cooperated nicely! P
post.content:
We had a great start to the Fruit Sale with our BLITZ this weekend… the weather cooperated nicely! Please remember PERSONAL SALE packets will be passed out after the WEDNESDAY 6-9 practice… HAPPY FRUIT SELLING :)

Avon Lake - Contest

Our first contest is this Saturday in AVON LAKE. Please plan to come out and support the band! Performances start at 6pm and our band performs at 8pm. Please see Mr. Vitale’s site for all the details.

Additionally, we still need FIVE chaperones!!! To volunteer.

Disney Trip Registration Is Still Open!

It is not too late to register for the Disney trip! Registration will remain open until the end of September. To register

Car Raffle Tickets

Your bando received two car raffle tickets to sell. Sold tickets and payment should be returned to the white band box no later than October 11th. You can get extra tickets to sell by contacting Joyce Fink: 440-237-1636

Senior Band Night

Just a reminder to all the SENIORS… please turn in your RSVP to the white band box as soon as possible…. Which would be now…. The Hospitality team needs to get their final orders in soon for flowers and food! Don’t delay! The invitation and RSVP have been emailed to you and are on our website. Questions? Please call Amy 216-702-1682 or Kristen 440-476-6960

Volunteer Button on Band Booster Webpage

An easy, one stop volunteer location is now on the homepage of the Band Booster website. The button is top left and by clicking you can see every event this going on with open volunteer opportunities!

Mark Your Calendar!

  • Sept 25 – Booster Meeting - 7pm in the Media Center
  • Sept 27 – Personal Fruit Sale packets distributed after 6-9 practice
  • Sept 29 – HOME - Hudson
  • Sept 30 – CONTEST – Avon Lake – see Mr. Vitale’s site for the itinerary
  • Oct 6 – HOME – Wadsworth
  • OCT 11 – ALL CAR RAFFLE TICKETS MUST BE TURNED INTO THE WHITE BAND BOX
